summary: This email from Janet Young at J.P. Morgan discusses the transfer of additional DTC securities to Pershing, LLC, detailing specific financial transactions and trade dates. It highlights the management of assets related to Epstein's financial dealings.

persons.name: Janet Young
persons.context: Janet Young is a Vice President at J.P. Morgan who is communicating about the transfer of securities related to Epstein's assets.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd is the recipient of the email, instructed to look out for the transferred securities.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is copied on the email regarding the asset transfer.

persons.name: Gina Magliocco
persons.context: Gina Magliocco is listed as an alternate contact for the correspondence.

persons.name: Jason Grosse
persons.context: Jason Grosse is also listed as an alternate contact for the correspondence.

keyFacts: The email discusses the transfer of additional DTC securities to Pershing, LLC.
Specific securities and their trade dates are detailed, indicating ongoing financial transactions.
Janet Young is the sender and a Vice President at J.P. Morgan, involved in managing Epstein's financial assets.
The email is marked confidential and subject to legal disclaimers.
There are multiple financial instruments mentioned with specific prices and trade dates.
